title: ActionDeclaration
description: Declarative definition of an action that may mutate application state.

title.description: Short human-readable label for the action.

description.description: Detailed explanation of what the action does.

targets.description: List of component IDs affected by this action.

input_schema.description: JSON Schema describing the inputs required to execute the action.

preconditions.description: Conditions that must be satisfied before the action may execute.

effects.description: Declarative description of which parts of state may change.

may_change.description: List of state paths that this action may modify.

items.description: State path expressed as dotted notation or JSON pointer.

permission.description: Permission and risk metadata governing execution.

confirmation_required.description: Whether explicit user confirmation is required before execution.

risk.description: Risk level associated with executing this action.

visibility.description: Whether this action is visible to end users or only developers.

cost.description: Abstract cost of executing this action.

precondition.description: A single precondition that must evaluate to true.

expr.description: Deterministic boolean expression evaluated against the state snapshot.
